Event.Message:
A corruption was discovered in the file system structure on volume %1.
%8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriveName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CorruptionState" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="HeaderFlags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Severity" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Origin" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Verb" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Description" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Signature" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Outcome" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SampleLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="SampleData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="SampleLength"/> <data name="SourceFile" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="SourceLine" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="SourceTag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CallStack" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system structure on volume %2 has now been repaired.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="RepairDetail" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RepairDataLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="RepairData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="RepairDataLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system structure on volume %2 cannot be corrected. Please run the chkdsk utility on the volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="RepairDetail" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RepairDataLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="RepairData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="RepairDataLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Too many repair events have occurred in a short period of time. Temporarily suspending posting of further repair events.

Skipped posting of %1 repair events. Repair event posting will now be resumed. Here are the skipped posting repair events count by repair verbs: BadFRS: %2 OrphanChildFRS: %3 BadClusters: %4 BadFreeClusters: %5 CrossLink: %6 SDEntry: %7 InvalidSecurityId: %8 IndexAttribute: %9 IndexSubtree: %10 IndexOffset: %11 IndexEntry: %12 IndexOrder: %13 Connect: %14 BreakCycle: %15 FRSAllocate: %16 Others: %17
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Total Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BadFrs Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OrphanChildFRS Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BadClusters Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BadFreeClusters Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CrossLink Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SDEntry Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InvalidSid Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexAttribute Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexSubtree Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexOffset Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexEntry Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexOrder Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Connect Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BreakCycle Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FRSAllocate Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Others Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
